name: Bursted: A wild odyssey
description:
Synopsis

In an empirical society where the people must contend with overpopulation, famine and many other evils, valiant explorers have discovered a Terra nullius. After a few excursions the population began to emigrate to this new world filled with dreams and hope, but also danger and magic. You play there as a young adult left for these wild lands, it's up to you to make a name for yourself.

Gameplay

The game takes place in a procedurally generated open world, the player can move in the 3 dimensions (earth, water, sky). He can harvest different resources depending on the area. The player can loot the entities he crosses by killing them or by harvesting with certain tools. There are certain actions the player can take to gain experience, with this experience he can improve his base stats and unlock new crafting and skills. The player can do quests which will grant him experience and resources. There are main quests and side quests.
